What we deliver

We help state and local public agencies build, buy, and share modern digital services to improve the user experience of government.

Custom products to solve your problems

If your agency’s project has a digital component, our team of software developers, visual designers, writers, and security experts can help you build it. We can help you:

  • Improve a challenging user process by reimagining a daunting task.
  • Build a new site and API to showcase and synthesize data from multiple sources.
  • Help you make your data more accessible with a user-friendly site and developer tools.
  • Build web-based tools to streamline internal agency processes.
  • Scope a solution or collaborate on an idea in a way that empowers you to meet the needs of your users.
  • Do user research and discovery sprints to promote a new digital model that houses information

Innovative ways to buy technology

We believe IT acquisitions can be faster, cheaper, and produce better results. If your agency is developing a new request for quotation for IT services or is interested in innovative ways to buy technology, our team is excited to work with you. We can help you:

  • Write agile, modular, and user-centered design into your request for quotations through our RFP Ghostwriting service.
  • Develop a marketplace to buy IT services using modern techniques.
  • Buy small pieces of open source code to advance your projects.

Platforms built for government

State and local public agencies face a unique set of technology problems. We’re building a suite of secure, scalable tools and platforms that any agency can use to solve these common problems. Our platforms are built with the needs of government addressed right at the beginning and are being actively improved to meet your needs. We can help you:

  • Host your applications in the cloud.
  • Build customizable and easy-to-maintain static sites.
  • Release and manage your API.

A path to becoming a digitally-powered organization

We can embed a fully-dedicated 17I team within your agency to work hand-in-hand with you to increase your internal digital capacity, help you form new digital habits, and ultimately drive organizational culture change. We can help you:

  • Attract, empower, and grow your own digital team.
  • Adopt a DevOps culture and begin a transition to the cloud.
  • Institute lean-agile practices, including agile acquisitions.
  • Establish a model to modernize your legacy systems.

Modern digital service techniques

We can provide your team with the skills and knowledge they need to modernize your agency’s digital services. We’ve also built a number of knowledge-sharing and documentation tools for 17I's own use that you can copy and use at your agency. We can help you:

  • Run a workshop on agile software development.
  • Host a design studio.
  • Create your own lightweight knowledge sharing platform based off atx’s Guides and Pages projects.
